direction.raw_text: season. NIKI then looks over at the car in pole position beside him. Another McLaren, but with number 11, and a Union Jack...

direction.raw_text: No, he's going on wets. The car in pole position: JAMES HUNT, surrounded by TV crews, mechanics, girlfriends, hangers-on.. The Maclaren team is less than half the size of Ferrari's, but HUNT makes up for this with magnetism. The rock star of F1. NIKI's face: a stab of envy seeing a flash of his rival's glamorous long blonde hair disappearing into his balaclava, flirting with several hot-looking GIRLS..

direction.raw_text: I don't know why it became such a big thing. We were just drivers. Busting each other's balls. To me this is perfectly normal. But other people saw it differently. (MORE) (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: : (2)                                                   5 NIKI (contid) That whatever it was between us went deeper. And changed us both somehow. Forever. NIKI stares, then...

direction.raw_text: Be, allora usiamo anche noi quells da bagnato. (Then we go on wets, too.) The ten-second board is held up. NIKI pulls down his visor...as he and HUNT's eyes meet for a split-second, eyes staring... NIKI selects second gear for the wet track and revs the engine. The dashboard needle climbs through 8000, 9000, 10000 RPM.

direction.raw_text: Maybe that explains the state of mind I was in. And why it happened. The other thing I'm remembered for. (a beat) On August 1st, that same year... CAPTION: "AUGUST 1st, 1976". The STARTER waves the flag. NIKI's foot hits the floor - his engine screams that deafening, stomach rearranging high-pitch scream, drowning out the roar of the 180,000 crowd. NIKI's car is catapaulted forward violently, the wheel-spin leaving livid black scars on the asphalt.. NIKI gets away first. A good start! But within seconds there's a McLaren car right behind him, breathing down his neck. His arch-rival. HUNT. But as the McLaren roars past, NIKI sees a white helmet. Number 12. It's not Hunt. It's MASS. On his bald, slick tyres. NIKI curses under his breath. He screwed up. Made the wrong decision. Should have gone on slicks. He urgently needs to change tyres... NIKI swerves angrily into the pits. Ferrari's pit is right at one end...

It's chaos. A traffic jam of Formula 1 cars... The Ferrari team frantically work. Changing NIKI's tyres. Four men with air guns, two men with rapid-duty jacks. The same Italian MECHANIC appears, `plugs in' his headset to the car..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hair visto? Ti aveto detto di usare le slicks! (See? I told you to go on slicks!!)

NUBURGRING - DAY                                             7 Archive TV commentary from the world's race COMMENTATORS stations informs us of the positions. MASS leading, HUNT in 3rd, LAUDA in 20th... 8   INT. NIKI'S CAR - DAY                                             8 NIKI gives it everything he's got. Tearing through the gears, trying to catch JAMES HUNT, breaking as late as he can, engine screaming. (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: :                                                       8 He flies over the take-off hump between Pflanzgarten and Swallowtail - passes one car after another. Into 13th place now. Pulling off outrageous manoeuvres. NIKI's P.O.V: the world flies past in a blur. The steering wheel shakes. The car is right on the edge. Cannot be driven any harder. NIKI approaches the Streckenteil Adenauer-Brucke section of the course...turns left at the Bergwerk corner. Crazy speed. And tight. Too tight. A mistake... "Thump", his wheels come into contact with the kerb on the inside. NIKI tries to counter-steer, but is travelling at 155 mph. The car jerks horribly to the right.. "Crunch", hits the embankment, then "Bang", hits the barrier, and is thrown across the track.. Fire breaks out in the engine. NIKI's eyes widen in horror, with another car bearing down upon him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...! The oncoming car crashes head-on into our car, "Crash", a sickening, terrifying impact. The car explodes. Seventy litres of burning high-octane gasoline, with NIKI strapped inside, unable to undo his seatbelt. Locked in a blast furnace. NIKI screams as the flames engulf him. 800 degrees temperature. Trapped inside his car. Burning smoke fills his helmet, scarring his lungs... Pandemonium: commentary in different languages as panicked TV commentators helplessly describe what's happening.. NIKI's POV: he can just make out the barely recognizable figures of the other DRIVERS rushing towards NIKI.. Their hands get burnt in the flames as they try unsuccessfully to undo NIKI's seatbelt.. Fire extinguishers blast at the car. Dry powder extinguishers. Covering NIKI's helmet. Blurring his vision, as he cries out in agony, inhaling the powder.. Screaming voices. Panicked reactions. On the side of the car, the painted name `Niki Lauda' blisters and melts. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

A regular Saturday late afternoon. The phone continues to ring.. Finally, an attractive station NURSE in her 20's, run-off-her- feet, breathlessly picks up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Emergency... She covers her ears, straining to hear, listening to what is being said. Then her expression changes...

direction.raw_text: Okay...standing by! The NURSE hangs up...then calls out to her NURSE and DOCTOR colleagues...

direction.raw_text: That was the race-track..! There's been an accident..! A driver's been injured and is on his way in..! Instantly the atmosphere changes. A hive of activity as DOCTORS and NURSES prepare themselves for a major trauma... All PATIENTS with minor injuries are cleared out of the way. The NURSE rings upstairs to the operating theatres and consultant surgeons, telling them to stand by... CAPTION: "EIGHTY-EIGHT RACES EARLIER" Swing doors open, and a pair of shoeless, BARE FEET walks through and into the accident and emergency unit. Camera tilts up a pair of long legs in white racing overalls...to reveal a tall, good-looking driver, JAMES HUNT, (mid 20's), tanned, athletic, surfer long blonde hair... A man about whom a word comes to mind one would rarely use to describe an Englishman. SEXY. Blood trickles from his nose, there is bruising to his lip and the formation (already) of a nasty black eye, but make no mistake. He rocks. Drop-dead gorgeous.. (CONTINUED)

JAMES'S APARTMENT - NIGHT                                  11 `Crash', the door flies open as JAMES and the NURSE stumble through, mid-embrace, tearing at one another's clothes... The apartment is basic. Cramped. Messy. Like that of a poor student. Ashtrays filled with half-smoked joints. Empty beer cans. A toaster. A kettle. A stereo. A cage containing two budgerigars. A mattress on the floor. Newspapers with headlines about the Dockers Strike, England's crumbling economy, Rolls Royce being bailed out by the government - subtle reminders of Britain in transition, leaving behind its strong, imperial past. JAMES and the NURSE stand against the wall, still half- dressed, but already passionately making love...

direction.raw_text: I have a theory why women like racing drivers. It's not because they respect what we do...driving round and round in circles. Mostly they think that's pathetic. And they're probably right.. (a beat) It's our closeness to death. JAMES and the NURSE continue noisily, tirelessly making love in the shower...

It's a wonderful way to live...and the ONLY way to drive. The only way to get that tenth of a second on everyone else... The lovemaking becomes more intense...

direction.raw_text: To dare to be one step bolder...one step faster... JAMES is covered in perspiration, out on the edge...

Up ahead though, approaching the second bend...JAMES sees the tiniest, slimmest crack to overtake. No right-minded driver would risk it. Only a suicidal maniac. "CRASH", another car forces NIKI into an evasive dive... Cars scream past him on all sides as the race continues... NIKI, battered, shaken, has had an unbelievably close escape. He rips off his helmet, furious... And now we see NIKI LAUDA's face for the first time. Sharp- featured. Intelligent eyes. Dark hair. Protruding teeth. direction.raw_text: Nothing wrong with being an amateur!

direction.raw_text: Said if he was going to risk his life, he would only do so on the big roulette table. Formula 1. So he got himself a drive with BRM.

direction.raw_text: What? How? He never won a thing! Not a single bloody race.

direction.raw_text: Amateurs are what made this country great.

direction.raw_text: "In war, as in lovemaking, amateurs are invariably better than professionals." Napoleon Bonaparte.

direction.raw_text: A hundred and fifty grand!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A hundred and fifty grand? JAMES stares. Already sick with envy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's either an act of utter lunacy, or the ballsiest thing I ever heard.
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He says the car is magnificent, a masterpiece, but he has suggestions for one or two minor refinements... 73   INT. FERRARI PRESS CONFERENCE - DAY                             73 A large press conference, with motoring JOURNALISTS and television CREWS from all over the world attending... ENZO FERRARI and LUCA DI MONTEZEMOLO addresses the conference (in Italian) which is translated by a translator...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are happy to welcome back to the Ferrari family our good friend, Clay Regazzoni...and also to introduce, from Austria Niki Lauda.. A burst of flash photography. NIKI and REGAZZONI sit side by side. 74   EXT. ITALIAN COUNTRY ROADS - DAY                                74 A car drives fast on country roads in Northern Italy... 75   INT. CAR - SAME TIME                                            75 CLAY REGAZZONI is driving, NIKI is in the passenger seat...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Ferrari Family". "Our good friend, Clay Regazzoni". (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                     75 REGAZZONI (contid) You're friend and family to the Commendatore as long as you win. The minute you don't.. (mimes execution)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I understand. It's business. I would be the same.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it isn't just business, is it? What we do? It's passion. Love. Which is why we're prepared to risk our lives for it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not me. If I thought I had more talent and could earn better money doing something else, I would.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But how do you know you will make money here? You haven't yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet. But I will. (smiles) If you can, I can. REGAZZONI shakes his head, can't help smiling...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, are you ever NOT an asshole? NIKI laughs...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why am I an asshole? You know by now I'm both quicker than you and better at setting up the car. You can't deal with that, then you're the asshole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Screw you. REGAZZONI pulls up outside the house...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I brought you along today because you seem like a lonely kind of guy. I thought if I introduce you to some nice people, it'd be good for you. Forget it. Make your own friends. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. C'mon, Clay... 76   EXT. COUNTRY HOUSE - NORTHERN ITALY - DAY                        76 NIKI stares through the window. Inside: a very appealing looking bunch - young, good-looking, cool, sexy GUESTS - all having a good time.. By contrast: NIKI catches his own reflection in the glass reflection. Pale. Intense. The outsider. Inside: REGAZZONI is surrounded by friends, telling a story. Everyone laughs. NIKI watches. Then turns to walk away. As he goes, the front door opens... And a beautiful dark-haired woman (MARLENE) emerges loading several BAGS into a car. Brunette, tan. Wearing a white dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you leaving?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you give me a lift to the nearest town? Anywhere with a train station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. Nearest town is half an hour's drive. Get in. 77   OMITTED                                                          77 78   EXT. ROAD - DAY                                                  78 The car drives. The radio plays. Marlene sings along. NIKI can't help noticing something. He turns down the music. MARLENE's smile fades..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You hear that noise when you accelerate?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your drive belt is loose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alternator. And when you brake, your foot goes all the way down. Means there's air in the system.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anything else?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Apart from the rear brakes are imbalanced. The front right wheel is flat, and it feels like a crack in the engine block...which explains why you're drifting so much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you tell?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My ass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God gave me an OK mind, but a really good ass, which can feel everything in a car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know what you're talking about. The car is fine. And it just had a service a week ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not a good one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A very good one. From a proper garage. It cost a fortune. This car is good as new. Relax.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOTORWAY - HARD SHOULDER - DAY                             79 White smoke pours from the engine. The car has broken down. Bonnet up. NIKI has tried fixing it, but to no avail. NIKI has a fan belt in his hand, but it's all but disintegrated under the heat of the over-worked engine. NIKI's hands are covered in oil. He is pushing a pen into a large crack in the engine, slick with oil and grease.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing I can do here. The car needs a garage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. You're not in a hurry, are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. As long as I'm back in Maranello by Monday morning. NIKI walks out into the road. Sticks out his thumb...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So who are you anyway? MARLENE breaks into GERMAN...(we see sub-titles)...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're from Vienna, aren't you. We can speak German. How do you know Curd?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's Curd?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Curd Jurgens. The actor. It's his house. He is, or was until yesterday, my boyfriend. I must have been mad! There is something very attractive about an older man when they behave like one. But when they behave like a frightened child.. MARLENE gets to her feet...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, let me do this. Otherwise we'll never get out of here. We're in Italy, after all. MARLENE indicates that NIKI should take a back seat, hitches up her skirt, showing long, tanned legs.. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                      79 SSSCCCREEEEEEEEECCCCCHHHHHHH!!!!! Immediately a passing car screeches to a halt, then reverses noisily to pull level. MARLENE smiles at NIKI...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not bad, eh? Three seconds. Admit it, you're impressed..! MARLENE smiles flirtatiously at the handsome, young Italian MEN driving the open-topped sports car..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ciao, Regazzi...! But the Italian MEN walk right past her, not seeing her, as if she's invisible, and stare at NIKI...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me...are you Niki Lauda?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God...!!! I told you it was him..!!! (blown away) Do you need a ride?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, we do... The ITALIAN MAN gestures to his car, as his friend loads MARLENE's luggage inside...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An honour, please!!! But on one condition.. The ITALIAN MAN whisper in NIKI's ear. MARLENE stares, not understanding, as NIKI protests, but then slowly, reluctantly gets into the car. He starts the engine. MARLENE watches as the ITALIAN MEN strap themselves in with the seat-belts, tightening them...giggling like schoolboys..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will someone please tell me what's going on? MARLENE turns to NIKI... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you, anyway? What do you DO?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know? He's a Formula I driver. Who just signed for Ferrari!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Him? Never. Impossible!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Formula 1 drivers have long hair, are sexy, have shirts open to here.. MARLENE indicates...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyway, look at the way he's driving!! Like an old man!! It's true. NIKI is driving in the slow lane. Like a pensioner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No need to drive fast. It only increases the percentage of risk. We're not in a hurry. No one is paying me. Right now, with zero incentive or reward, why would I drive fast? MARLENE looks at him with her dark green eyes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I'm asking you to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And do you always get what you want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Usually. NIKI stares, trying to resist...but cannot. He does a lightning double-declutch... "SLAM", NIKI's foot hits the floor, the engine screams, the rev counter flies to the right... And the open-topped sports car lurches into warp-drive... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God...!! The ITALIAN MEN scream in excitement, holding on for dear life as NIKI, his heart not a beat over 60, takes the car to breaking point, in a way it's never been driven before... NIKI overtakes everyone on the motorway, fearlessly weaving between cars at twice their speed.. We CLOSE on NIKI's eyes, remaining dead calm as his passengers scream all around him, as he accelerates through the other cars on the motorway... His EYES remain calm, his WHEELS a blur of speed, and we...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 80   EXT. USA GP - WATKINS GLEN - 5TH OCTOBER 1975 - TRACK - DAY      80 Calm EYES, and WHEELS moving in a blur of speed. We're in the middle of a Grand Prix, and NIKI is driving at the limit... CAPTION: "1975". Ahead of him: a familiar sight. The back of JAMES HUNT's Hesketh.. 81   EXT. PITS - DAY                                                  81 MARLENE watches on TV in the pits as NIKI is engaged in an epic tussle with JAMES... Commentators note the improvement in JAMES's technique, maturity and performance. But then, "Puff", a plume of smoke comes out of JAMES's engine. The engine has blown... Immediately JAMES loses speed, and NIKI sails past, overtaking effortlessly. Taking the chequered flag. Television commentary in various languages tells us: NIKI LAUDA has become world champion... 82   EXT. FERRARI PITS/USA GP TRACK SIDE - DAY                        82 NIKI's car pulls in, to be mobbed by jubilant MECHANICS as he gets out of his car, removing his helmet, embraced by a delighted LUCA DI MONTEZEMOLO... (CONTINUED) 49 82   CONTINUED:                                                     82 ...then falling into a passionate kiss with MARLENE... Champion of the World, he is immediately swallowed up by REPORTERS who are demanding interviews in Italian, German, English... 83   EXT. USA GP/PADDOCK - DAY                                       83 An impromptu party in the paddock area. The victor's garland still round his neck, proudly holding the FIA World Champion trophy, his hair matted with champagne, NIKI passes through the crowds, accepting everyone's congratulations.. He runs into JAMES, who's in bare feet as usual. MARLENE is pulled away to talk to someone else..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Though with a car like that, the rest of us never stood a chance...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe the fact the car is so good might have something to do with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're still in a Ferrari. And I'm still in a Hesketh. On equal terms, the way it was in Formula 3, I'd beat you, and you know it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never. You might get lucky and win one race. Maybe two. Because you're aggressive. But in the long run, over the course of a season, no chance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because you're not serious. You're just a party guy. Which is why everyone likes you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now try saying that and tell me you're not jealous. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                     83 NIKI But all that affection, all those smiles is also a sign of their disrespect! They don't fear you. Whereas compare that to me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whom no one likes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not even his own team-mates..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right! Because I'm relentless. I don't screw up. I go to bed early. I look after myself, look after my car. And then, soon as the race is finished, I go home. You should go home more often, too. I heard you got married.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So where is she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In New York. Working.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know I've never seen you with her, once... NIKI turns to MARLENE, "Let's go".. 84   EXT. EASTON NESTON - DAY                                        84 JAMES's Mini roars furiously up the long gravel driveway towards Easton Neston. Screeches to a halt. JAMES gets out of the car. Is greeted by staff, whom he uncharacteristically ignores, storming past... 85   INT. EASTON NESTON - WORKSHOP - DAY                             85 JAMES walks into the workshops where BUBBLES HORSLEY is busy doing something... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                    85 JAMES Right, whatever it takes to beat Lauda, just say it, your word is my command. I'll do it. There are no lengths to which I will not go. And I mean it this time... JAMES stops, noticing BUBBLES's expression...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the matter? Then JAMES notices what BUBBLES is doing. He's packing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing? Then JAMES notices the lack of activity in the workshops. None of the usual mechanics, or engineers..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is everyone? BUBBLES looks up. Unsure how to break it to him. 86   INT. DRAWING-ROOM - EASTON NESTON - DAY                          86 An old drawing-room. The open fire roars. But HESKETH is uncharacteristically quiet. Defeated..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know what the date is today?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: November 14th.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have any idea of the significance of that date?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm assuming it refers to some animal you are allowed or no longer allowed to slaughter on your estate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually it's the deadline for securing sponsorship for the forthcoming Formula 1 season. (a beat) Which elapsed at midnight last night. And we didn't attract any. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                     86 JAMES So? We aren't looking for sponsorship. Condoms and cigarettes. Vulgar, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right. Except we are. Or were. I've made something of a miscalculation. The economics. Formula 1. Reality thereof. Turns out not like the lower divisions at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you saying?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm saying it's over, Superstar. The banks have stepped in. Read me the riot act. Started laying everyone off. Probably have to sell this place. Fun while it lasted, would do it all again and all that... (ashen) I daren't tell you the actual figures. JAMES stares at a devastated HESKETH...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Christ. 87   INT. JAMES'S FLAT - LONDON - NIGHT                              87 JAMES is on the phone to his brother PETER, while playing Scale-electrix cars on a track alone, barefoot...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need a drive, Pete. Need you to find me a drive. (listens) What does that mean? "My reputation precedes me?" "Crash", the electric toy car crashes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? Is that what they said? (a beat) Did they at least say a "Quick arsehole?" (listens) Bollocks to Lotus. Find me someone else. I'll go mad otherwise. "Click", JAMES hangs up. SUZY walks in. Sees his mood.. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                     87 SUZY Don't worry. Something will turn up. JAMES opens a bottle of Scotch, pours himself a drink...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I doubt that will help in the meantime. JAMES knocks back the drink...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't we go away for the week-end? Before I leave again for New York? JAMES carries on drinking..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talk to me, James. Don't make a stranger of me. JAMES doesn't react...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't watch this. SUZY picks up her coat, and bag..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were you hoping for? A well- adjusted knight in shining armour?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No danger of that....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me give you some advice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm all ears...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't go to men who are willing to kill themselves driving in circles looking for normality.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I certainly didn't get that...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should have gone for one of my brothers. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There goes that self-pity again. How striking it is -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that? Tell me..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The gulf between appearance and reality. Look at you, all sunshine blonde beauty and smiles...yet the reality is...a frightened, immature, depressed, self-pitying child...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At least there's SOMETHING behind the facade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With a nasty temper..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck off to New York, dear. There must be a moisturizer or eye shadow somewhere that needs your vapid mush to flog it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How quickly beauty can turn ugly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agreed. Repellent. SUZY stares...and goes. JAMES carries on drinking. 88   OMITTED                                                          88 89   OMITTED                                                          89 90   INT. JAMES'S FLAT - FOLLOWING MORNING                            90 The following morning. The phone rings. Piercing the darkness. JAMES, clearly the worse for wear, is talking to his beloved budgies...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good girl... A surprising vulnerability, and childlike innocence about JAMES. He strokes the birds with real tenderness.. The phone continues ringing. JAMES picks it up... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                      90 JAMES (INTO PHONE) Hello? JAMES listens, then hears something on the phone that makes him sit up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who? McLaren? JAMES is waking rapidly now..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just get me in a room with them, Pete. Say anything. Today? Yes, I can do today. (checks watch) I can be there in an hour. JAMES starts scribbling down the address. 91   EXT. MCLAREN HQ - TO ESTABLISH                                   91 The headquarters of McLaren Racing in Colnbrook, Bucks. A small, unassuming building on the Poyle Trading Estate. Bare brickwork surrounds a brash yellow facade, with the words `MCLAREN RACING' in large white letters. 92   INT. MCLAREN HQ - BOARDROOM - DAY                                92 A large boardroom. Team Director TEDDY MAYER (American, from Pennsylvania, short, lawyerly, 50's - hair turning grey) sits at the head of the table. Next to him is Aussie Marlboro spokesman JOHN HOGAN and McLaren Team Manager and chief mechanic ALASTAIR CALDWELL. The atmosphere is tense, uncomfortable...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll come straight to the point. Our esteemed lead driver...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fitti-fucking-paldi..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Has ditched us for another team at the last minute..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In November. Fucking outrageous. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                     92 MAYER And we need a replacement. Asap. Thankfully a few hands have already gone up. Good people...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like Jackie Ickx.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm quicker than Jackie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But he's consistent, dependable. Sponsor friendly. He'll dress up nice. Say the right things.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want? A driver or a brushes salesman?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We want to be successful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So do I. But I measure that in podium finishes and beating Niki Lauda not being a show pony for sponsors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've heard about this thing with Lauda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone has..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really think you can beat him? He's World Champion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I beat him in Formula 3.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This season alone he's had eight podiums, five wins, you've had what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only because I've been in the wrong car. I beat him when the playing field was level. I'd beat him again in a McLaren. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the only car out there as good as the Ferrari. Which is why I'm here, begging. JAMES stares imploringly..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll do whatever you ask. Even put on a suit, talk to sponsors and say the right thing. I promise. (a beat) Just give me the drive... CALDWELL, HOGAN and MAYER look at one another... 93   OMITTED                                                         93 94   OMITTED                                                         94 95   OMITTED                                                         95 96   OMITTED                                                         96 97   OMITTED                                                         97 98   EXT. SOUTH AFRICA GRAND PRIX - KYALAMI - 6TH MARCH 1976- DAY    98 Various shots, to establish. South Africa in the apartheid era. We notice black race FANS unable to get into the track.. CAPTION: "THE 1976 FORMULA 1 SEASON" COMMENTATOR ...welcome to the Kyalami Racetrack where the big news is.. 99   EXT. SOUTH AFRICA - KYALAMI RACE TRACK - DAY                    99 Crowds flood to the spectator stands. The pit lane stretches into the distance, filled with cars, drivers and mechanics...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...that Britain's James Hunt in his first race for Mclaren has qualified fastest, beating Niki Lauda's Ferrari to pole by two hundredths of a second. In the crowds to watch the race none other than movie stars Richard Burton and Liz Taylor... We pick out RICHARD BURTON and LIZ TAYLOR waving to screaming FANS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STARTING GRID - KYALAMI - DAY                             100 NIKI and JAMES's cars lined up in positions 1 and 2 on the starting grid. JAMES proudly indicates to NIKI...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: New car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I noticed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pole position.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I noticed that, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Level playing field now, my ratty little friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's see where we are at the end of lap one. NIKI calls after JAMES as he walks to his car...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's see where we are in six races time!! JAMES turns, makes a ratty face at NIKI. Protruding teeth. 101 EXT. VIP GRANDSTAND - DAY                                      101 RICHARD BURTON and LIZ TAYLOR are shown into the VIP area of the paddock. They take their seats.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bored already) Will this take very long? An OFFICIAL introduces BURTON to various people - among them SUZY HUNT...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Richard Burton...Suzy Miller, also known as Mrs. James Hunt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who? There it is. The deep, dark, sonorous Welsh baritone voice...scarred by alcohol and cigarettes... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                    101 SUZY James Hunt. One of the racers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forgive me. Richard. (extending hand) Also known as Mr. Elizabeth Taylor. He indicates LIZ who is deeply bored..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does a girl have to do to get a drink around here? SUZY smiles. Their eyes meet. And no eyes are more beautiful than SUZY's. An immediate connection between them. Their hands hold a fraction too long as they shake... 102 OMITTED                                                        102 103 OMITTED                                                        103 104 EXT. RACE TRACK - DAY                                          104 NIKI's car roars past the finishing line first. JAMES closely behind... CAPTION: "SOUTH AFRICA. LAUDA WINS. HUNT SECOND." 104AEXT. PODIUM    - KYALAMI - DAY                                104A JAMES and NIKI are on the podium together...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My car wasn't right today. Next time I'll have you..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah... 105 OMITTED                                                        105 106 OMITTED                                                        106 107 OMITTED                                                        107 108 EXT. SPANISH GRAND PRIX - JARAMA, 2ND MAY 1976- DAY            108 JAMES's car takes the chequered flag, finishing first!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MCLAREN PITS                                         108A In the pits: TEDDY MAYER, ALASTAIR CALDWELL and JOHN HOGAN leap to their feet in delight. Punching the air. Victory.. CAPTION: "RACE 3. SPAIN. HUNT WINS..." 108BEXT. SPANISH GRAND PRIX PODIUM/ PITLANE                       108B Afterwards: JAMES and NIKI are on the podium together...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did I tell you? Car fixed. Equal terms. You'd better get used to this. JAMES walks off, to celebrate with the McLaren team... NIKI stares darkly - threatened - watching JAMES go.. ...then goes to talk to LUCA DE MONTEZEMOLO and the FERRARI team. CAPTION: "...BUT IS THEN DISQUALIFIED". 109 EXT. SPANISH GP PADDOCK/ PARC FERME- DAY                      109 A huge furore as several OFFICIALS and FERRARI TEAM MEMBERS, and TV CREWS surround JAMES's car... Raised voices debating the width of the car, HUNT furious, people almost coming to blows...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The car is too wide..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five eighths of an inch..!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which makes it illegal! If you want to compete, you have to change it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? You can't just `change it'. That means rebuilding the car. Who lodged the complaint? It was Ferrari, wasn't it? The two rival PIT CREWS, (McLaren and Ferrari), scream abuse at one another in Italian and English - a highly charged and explosive atmosphere.... CAPTION: "LAUDA GETS MAXIMUM POINTS" (CONTINUED) 61 109 CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watches from the inside of the FERRARI TRAILER. 110 INT. MCLAREN WORKSHOP - NIGHT                                  110 The McLaren MECHANICS, supervised by Alastair Caldwell, are making adjustments to the car to make it `legal'..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't stand it... The tyre continues bouncing, people diving out of it's path, before the tyre finally smashes into a hot-dog stand... CAPTION: "RACE 6. LAUDA WINS AGAIN. HUNT RETIRES." (CONTINUED)

PADDOCK/PRESS TENT - DAY                                 113A Later: the victorious NIKI, wearing the garland, is all smiles, giving `winner' interviews, surrounded by MARLENE and a delighted LUCA DI MONTEZEMOLO. JAMES is also giving interviews, but in a total fury. Vibrating with anger. Still complaining about the disqualification. Complaining about a conspiracy. Complaining. NIKI finishes talking to JOURNALISTS, and walks off, through crowds, and bumps into JAMES..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So...six races in. How's it going so far?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine! Just got a little problem with a bad loser rat and his team of Italian saboteurs who've destroyed my car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I won that race in Spain. And you know it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In an illegal car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The aerofoil was five eighths of an inch too long!! Something that doesn't have the slightest effect on car speed. You complained. Now we've had to totally rebuild the car and it's become a monster. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                   113A NIKI At least it's a LEGAL monster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A car that was beating you week in week out, so you have to resort to this. Cheating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He drives in an illegal car and he calls ME the cheat? Let me tell you: two weeks before that race in Spain, we put 20-inch rims on the rear wheels. We get an extra half second speed on each lap!! But the Old Man tells me we can't use those rims, they make the car too wide. Against the rules. So we go back to 19-inch rims making the car slower again. Rules are rules. For all of us. You're just a bad loser who can't accept that. (tapping head, to MARLENE) Komm, he's crazy. Sick in the head. NIKI turns to MARLENE, speaks in German...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Den Trottel lassen wir alleine.. (Let's go. Leave this jerk alone.) No wonder she left him... NIKI and MARLENE go. JAMES is left staring. Not understanding. 114 INT/EXT. ZOLDER PADDOCK/ MCLAREN TRUCK - DAY                   114 JAMES walks into the crowded MCLAREN pits. Sees TEDDY MAYER and ALASTAIR CALDWELL...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there something I should know about Suzy? Where is she? Wasn't she supposed to be here today? CALDWELL nervously indicates the Sunday newspapers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We kept it from you. Didn't want to tell you before the race... JAMES looks at the newspapers, then his expression changes. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus. 115 EXT. HOTEL SUITE - DAY                                         121 A large hotel suite. There are flowers everywhere. Newspapers are all over the table. JAMES sits opposite SUZY. He sees an expensive gift; recently opened. A diamond necklace..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That from him? SUZY nods. Even the uninitiated eye can tell: it's worth a fortune. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                    121 SUZY Why have you come here, James?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To get you back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't want me back...you never wanted to be married in the first place. You did it because you hoped it might change you...settle you down... help with the racing. Not because you loved me. And who knows, if it had been just the drinking, or the dope, or the infidelity, or the moods...it might even have worked...but when it's all of them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. I'm terrible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you're not terrible. You're just...who you are...at this point in your life. And God help anyone that wants more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will he be able to give you more? He has quite the bad boy reputation himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's important is how it feels to me. And it feels like he adores me. A flicker behind JAMES's eyes. Failure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's aware of the delicacy of the situation, and how it looks. Having raided your larder. Plundered your safe. Smash and grab, and so forth. So he's assured me he'll take care of the financial side. And will be very generous. JAMES manages a brave smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. I'll give him a call. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. His lawyers will contact you. JAMES notices the vast unmade bed. Where, until recently, two people had slept. 121AEXT. HOTEL - MANHATTAN - DAY                                  121A JAMES emerges from the hotel - into the storm of paparazzi again. He manages a brave smile...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all very amicable. My wife has found herself a new backer...I mean lover...which makes her happy.. (laughter) Mr. Burton has found a way of feeling young again...let's hope his pockets are deep...they'll need to be... (laughter) And I've found a way to be single again without it costing me a penny, which has to go down as the biggest win of my career. Laughter from the JOURNALISTS who are hungrily writing down the copy. But JAMES's hollow smile fools no one... 122 INT. JUMBO JET - FIRST CLASS - DAY                             122 JAMES sits alone in the first class section. A loser on the track, and a loser in love, too. Being played out in the full glare of publicity. On the front pages. Being read by everyone on the plane. A STEWARDESS looks over, catches his eye. Smiles. 123 INT. JUMBO JET - WC - DAY                                      123 JAMES and the STEWARDESS fucking. Hard. Nothing to do with pleasure. An analgesic - a way of blocking out the pain. JAMES catches his own reflection in the mirror. Teeth clenched. Eyes burning with anger and self-loathing... OVER THIS: we fade in the ROAR of car engines... 123AINT. FRENCH GP 1976 - PAUL RICARD - 4TH JULY 1976             123A JAMES's teeth still clenched. Eyes still burning with anger. Driving flat out. At the limit. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                   123A Suzy's words still ringing in his ears. Make that beyond the limit. At the point of no return. The car shaking. Weaving recklessly through other cars... Where death has become a real option. Because he doesn't care anymore. Because it's all he deserves anyway... And in that moment, in reaching his lowest point, JAMES has unwittingly stumbled on the one thing that gives him an advantage over everyone else... The fact that he doesn't care. The fact that death has become an option. The fact that there is no risk he is not prepared to take... So every corner is tighter, every braking point later, every gap is an opening, no matter how tiny... 124 EXT. direction.raw_text: ...James, a few weeks ago, you were out of the running for this season completely, now you're right back in it. What's changed...? Screaming GIRLS in the background, shouting "James, we love you." JAMES stares across the room at NIKI...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A combination of factors, not all of which I'm prepared to discuss here. Justice being done re: the disqualification in Spain helps, and having my old car back of course... In the other corner: NIKI is doing his interviews in German, (we see sub-titles)... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mathematically in theory it's now possible for Hunt to catch you. Are you worried?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not at all. For him to catch me, he'd have to win all the remaining races, and I'd have to lose them. And pigs would have to fly. Laughter among the confident GERMANS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now if you'll excuse me, I have a private family matter to attend to. NIKI takes MARLENE's hand, and leads her away. 132 EXT. VIENNESE REGISTRY OFFICE - DAY                            132 To establish: the Viennese skyline. 133 INT. REGISTRY OFFICE - DAY                                     133 NIKI and MARLENE get married. In stark contrast to JAMES's wedding...it's a small, intimate affair. Modest. Not showy. Away from the cameras. Just them. And a witness from the pub. 134 EXT. AIRFIELD - DAY                                            134 A small aeroplane takes off... 135 INT. AEROPLANE - DAY                                           135 NIKI and an INSTRUCTOR are in the plane. In the cockpit. With MARLENE, who watches... NIKI is learning to fly. HOUSE - IBIZA - NIGHT                                     138 MARLENE walks through the house, looking for NIKI. Then finds him on a balcony...alone..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come to bed. MARLENE notices his mood. It's different.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the matter?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the enemy, you know. Happiness. NIKI looks up at MARLENE...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It weakens you. Puts doubt in your mind. Because all of a sudden you have something to lose.. MARLENE stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you call happiness an enemy, then it's too late. (a beat) Then you have lost already. MARLENE turns, and goes.. NIKI is left alone. We can tell from his expression, he is struggling with something for the first time. Fear. 139 EXT. direction.raw_text: Who by?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Niki. JAMES's face. Instantly suspicious. 142 INT. MEETING ROOM - NURBURGRING RACE TRACK - DAY               142 About sixty people, (26 DRIVERS and all the different team REPRESENTATIVES), are assembled in the room, where a blazered FIA OFFICIAL and a member of the DRIVERS SAFETY COMMITTEE are sitting behind a table... A buzz of anticipation and curiosity. What's going on? What is all this about? NIKI gets to his feet, raises his hands calling for silence... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                    142 NIKI Thank you. I called this meeting because as all drivers know the Nurburgring is a race track from the Stone Ages. The most stupid, barbaric, outdated, dangerous, track in the world. You've all seen the rain which has been falling this morning. Those of you with experience know the Ring needs perfect conditions to be even remotely acceptable in terms of risk. As you can see today is anything BUT perfect, so I called this meeting to take a vote to cancel the race. A ripple of astonished reactions among the drivers..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There would be no change to the situation as far as points is concerned. The race would simply be cancelled. TEDDY MAYER looks over at FERRARI representatives....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is bullshit... Another DRIVER (GUY EDWARDS) gets to his feet...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If the race is cancelled, none of us get our race fees...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's true. You leave without your fee, but you might leave with your LIFE. Another voice pierces the controversy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It also means you would effectively win the championship. It's JAMES HUNT, who is standing up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So I can see why this suits you just fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? There would be no points for me either... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But there would be one race less where
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Glamorous, long-haired, tanned, fashionable - like rock stars, they talk effortlessly and flirt confidently with AGNES. What are you doing answering the phones? New haircut! Like it. What have you done to the weather? They make her laugh. And smile. NIKI feels invisible. Embarrassed. Awkward. Inadequate. He gets to his feet. And goes to the car that has come to collect him. As he goes, (unseen by NIKI), AGNES watches him. Ignoring the other DRIVERS. Intrigued. He's different. Interesting. Intense. Intelligent eyes. 31   EXT. BRM WORKSHOPS - DAY                                         31 The car pulls up outside the workshops. location: BRANDS HATCH -DAY 129 JAMES, TEDDY MAYER, ALASTAIR CALDWELL,

direction.raw_text: or anyone else, could catch you. Uproar in the room...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: James is right! This is just tactics!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ferrari's dirty tricks! We've seen it before!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe it's just that he's frightened? Laughter among the DRIVERS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which asshole said this? Silence. No hand goes up. No one has the courage to own up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I am frightened. Always a little bit when I race. I accept every time I get in my car there is 20% chance that I could die. But not one per cent more. And today, with the rain the risk IS more. How dare you accuse me of lack of courage? Let me remind you. I have the track record here. I am the only person in history to do the Ring in under 7 minutes. So actually it's to my ADVANTAGE to race here today. Because I'm quicker than all of you. A stunned silence. One voice pierces the room...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. Then let's race! It's JAMES who stares at NIKI: a ripple of excitement and enthusiasm among the other drivers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a hundred thousand fans out there who would never forgive us if we didn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And some of us need our race fees!! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All those in favour of cancelling the race? NIKI puts his hand up. One or two other racers, too...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All those in favour of racing? JAMES puts his hand up. Clearly the more popular, charismatic figure among the DRIVERS, everyone else follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen, start your engines!! A clear victory for JAMES. He has swung the room. Everyone leaves the room. JAMES and TEDDY MAYER give one another a discreet hi-five... But we rack focus through the crowd to see NIKI staring at JAMES accusingly...holding his gaze. 143 EXT. STARTING GRID - DAY                                       143 "RRRROAAAR", an explosion of noise, as we widen and find ourselves on the starting grid of the German Grand Prix. An OFFICIAL walks through the cars holding aloft a sign, "One Minute"... Deafening, angry thunder, as cars rev their engines. 143AAN EYE FLICKERS - WIDE OPEN - STARING INTENTLY                143A A pupil dilates and contracts in the light. The eye stares. Blinks. Thinks. Making evaluations.. 144 EXT. CLOUDY SKY - GERMANY - DAY                                144 This time the eye belongs to JAMES. He stares up at the clouds. His eyelids flicker. Thinking. Agonizing. Wrestling with an all important decision... Is it going to carry on raining? Or become dry? ALASTAIR CALDWELL comes up to JAMES, and shouts above the noise - no time to plug his headset in... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                    144 CALDWELL Jochen's going on slicks. You want to change? JAMES looks in his wing-mirror back to his colleague, JOCHEN MASS's car, number 12, several rows behind him. White helmet. A team of Mclaren MECHANICS hastily changing the tyres to bald, dry tyres - ('slicks'). Then JAMES looks over at the car beside him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Has Niki changed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He's going on wets. NIKI's car: surrounded by Italian Ferrari MECHANICS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then we go on wets, too. JAMES pulls down his visor...as he and NIKI's eyes meet for a split-second, then... The STARTER waves the flag. They're off! JAMES's foot hits the floor - his engine screams at almost 9,000 rpms, drowning out the roar of the 180,000 crowd. The car is catapaulted forward, the wheel-spin leaving livid black scars on the asphalt.. JAMES and NIKI both make good starts, and are neck and neck, but within seconds there's a McLaren right behind them, gaining fast. JAMES realizes it's his team-mate, JOCHEN MASS in a white helmet. Number 12. On his slick tyres. MASS was right to gamble on the track drying out. JAMES curses under his breath...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit...! JAMES screwed up. Made the wrong decision. He urgently needs to change tyres. With barely one lap completed... He swerves angrily into the pits..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PITS - DAY                                                145 Commentary from all the world's TV stations explaining the crazy, panicked situation as JAMES comes into the pits to change to dry tyres. The McLaren team frantically changes the tyres. Four men with air guns, two men with rapid-duty jacks. ALASTAIR CALDWELL appears, talks to JAMES..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See? I told you to go on slicks!! You didn't take my advice...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up! Where's Niki?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Behind you! He made the same mistake! JAMES looks in his mirror to see NIKI's red helmet behind him in the pits, then... "Thump", new (slick) tyres hit the tarmac. JAMES gets the signal, `Clear!'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go! Go!! Go!! JAMES's foot hits the floor. He roars out, with new tyres, leaving NIKI behind him in the pits... 146 EXT. NUBURGRING - DAY                                          146 Archive commentary: from the world's TV stations informs us that JAMES roars up into 3rd position.. 147 INT. JAMES'S CAR - DAY                                         147 JAMES gives it everything he's got. Tearing through the gears, breaking as late as he can, engine screaming. The world flies past in a blur. The steering wheel shakes. The car cannot be driven any harder. No thought for safety. No thought of failure.. Failure is unimaginable. Unconscionable. He turns into the final straight, then stops when he sees something ahead. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                     147 Flags. Red flags. RACE MARSHALLS. Something has clearly happened. An accident.. The race is being stopped. JAMES brakes, slowing down. He pulls level with a uniformed MARSHALL..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Accident. Bad one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't know yet. 148 INT. NIKI'S CAR - SAME TIME                                     148 NIKI's POV: a continuation of the opening scene. Burning smoke fills NIKI's helmet, burning his lungs. He cries out in agony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!!! We can just make out the barely recognizable figures of the other DRIVERS rushing towards him, as their hands get burnt in the flames as they try unsuccessfully to undo his seatbelt... We notice it is the same DRIVERS that were critical of NIKI in the driver's meeting. HARALD ERTL, BRETT LUNGER, ARTURO MERZARIO, GUY EDWARDS... Fire extinguishers blast at the car. Covering NIKI's helmet. Filling his lungs with chemicals, along with the smoke and fumes, blurring his vision, as he screams horribly.. The sound of panicked TV COMMENTARY in different languages. Screaming voices. Panicked reactions. Then sound fades. As NIKI blacks out - losing consciousness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : OVER THIS: the hypnotic sound of helicopter blades...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: August 1st, 1976, I discovered comas exist for a reason.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MANNHEIM UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL - DAY                        149 NIKI's POV: the door to a helicopter opens, as it arrives at Mannheim University Hospital... The sound of shouting voices. Hospital STAFF pull reach towards NIKI, pull his stretcher out. NIKI's internal voice groans: cries out at the pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some things are better not remembered. 150 INT. MANNHEIM UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL - DAY                        150 "Crash", doors burst open and NIKI is rushed into emergency. Neon ceiling lights pass overhead... The sound of difficult breathing. His stretcher is surrounded by DOCTORS, talking urgently, making quick assessments.. Gives it everything he's got, breaking as late as he can, tearing through the gears... For NIKI the world flies past in a near-blind blur. The steering wheel shakes. The car cannot be driven any harder. But the visibility is terrible. The spray tears into his scarred eyes. He is unable to see anything but... MARLENE's beautiful face: staring at him. Smiling tenderly. Kissing him tenderly. 195 OMITTED                                                        195 196 OMITTED                                                        196 98 197 EXT. RACE TRACK - JAPAN - SAME TIME                            197 JAMES continues to race flat out. Engine screaming. Foot to the floor. His car aquaplanes again...almost skidding out... 198 INT. HOTEL - MANHATTAN - SAME TIME                             198 SUZY HUNT is watching on television as RICHARD BURTON talks in the background on the telephone...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urging him on) Come on, James... 199 EXT. PITS - RACE TRACK - JAPAN - DAY                           199 A sign is held up as JAMES races. Lap 39. But there are problems with the car. One of the tyres...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God! His front tyre! Look! It's completely frayed! CALDWELL and TEDDY MAYER watch in horror from the pits and on TV. They can see the shaking car..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hunt's car has problems...it's shaking...the Englishman is definitely getting slower... 199AEXT. PITS - RACE TRACK - JAPAN - DAY                          199A ALASTAIR CALDWELL holds up a sign....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...with just a few laps to go, McLaren are calling for Hunt to come into the pits to change tyres... JAMES's car roars past the pits, refusing to stop...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Hunt is refusing! Simply ignoring his team's orders...! He's made the calculation that he can still hold onto the lead...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EASTON NESTON - SAME TIME                               199B HESKETH and BUBBLES cover their eyes. Can't look...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: James!! What are you doing???
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't bear it! 199CINT. JAMES'S CAR - JAPAN GRAND PRIX - SAME TIME              199C Suddenly, a Ferrari in JAMES's wing mirror. Unmistakably, even in the spray, he can see the distinctive RED HELMET... It's NIKI. JAMES's blood runs cold...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! No! NO!!!! JAMES tries to fend NIKI off. Swerves this way and that. But his wounded car is now running at seventy per cent at best... ...and disaster!!! NIKI OVERTAKES HIM... JAMES screams in agony and frustration. He's lost it! And has no one to blame but himself! His own arrogance. And stubbornness. NIKI's overtaken him! THE CHEQUERED FLAG. JAMES roars past. Has finished in third place. But that is no consolation. NIKI has beaten him. As far as he's concerned.. JAMES has lost. Lost everything. 200 EXT. PITS - DAY                                                200 JAMES's car arrives in the pits. In a fury. At himself. For refusing to listen. What a disgrace. What shame. What a fool. But he is engulfed. JAMES gets out of his car, raging...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry! But TEDDY MAYER is celebrating wildly. ALASTAIR CALDWELL, too. The world's media descends on JAMES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry?? What are you talking about?? You did it! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                   200 JAMES What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You WON!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rubbish!! What about Niki?? He overtook me!! I saw it!! A Ferrari with a red helmet..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That wasn't Niki. That was Regazzoni.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What???
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Niki withdrew. Said it was too dangerous, refused to drive!! (gestures) You're Champion of the World, kiddo! TEDDY MAYER takes JAMES's number `11' from the side of his car, and tears it in two, leaving number `1'. JAMES's face: as he realizes. Then explodes with happiness. 200AINT. EASTON NESTON - DAY                                     200A HESKETH and BUBBLES cheer in celebration...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He did it! He bloody well did it! 200BINT. HOSPITAL - NIGHT                                        200B A television plays in the Emergency Ward of the hospital. NURSIE catches sight of the victory, patients cheering and applauding... NURSIE allows herself a smile. 200CINT. HOTEL - MANHATTAN - SAME TIME                           200C BURTON is at the door in tuxedo, waiting to go. SUZY, dressed glamorously, smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well done, James.. Then turns the TV off. And follows BURTON out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JAPAN GRAND PRIX - DAY                                  200D JAMES is embraced by CALDWELL and MAYER. 201 EXT. FUJI PADDOCK - HELICOPTER - SAME TIME                     201 Across the race-track, the sound of helicopter blades turning. JAMES looks over to see... NIKI in the helicopter with MARLENE and a PILOT. NIKI, now the ex-World Champion, looks over to see a triumphant JAMES surrounded by press, McLaren colleagues, etc
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you OK? NIKI turns, takes MARLENE's hand as he answers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. It's just one race. The helicopter lifts into the air, and flies off... 202 EXT. PADDOCK - SAME TIME                                       202 JAMES watches as the helicopter carrying NIKI flies away, then turns to see... ...the world's press begins to descend on him, and the biggest party of JAMES HUNT's life is about to begin.. In the background, the two JAPANESE DRIVERS are giving interviews again. They didn't just survive, MASAHIRO HASEMI got the fastest lap of the race, and NORITAKE TAKAHARA came 9th... And at that moment, magically, the sun breaks through, and the snowy peak of Mount Fuji is finally revealed. 203 A QUICKFIRE MONTAGE                                            203 Of newspaper headlines, television talk shows, lucrative endorsements, TV commercials, sponsorship, public billboards. JAMES's world championship victory has made him a rich man. His movie star looks make him an international STAR and marketing man's dream. Girls, more girls, and even more girls. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                     203 JAMES, dashing in a white suit, plays trumpet on the UK's most famous talk show... FADE TO BLACK: 204 EXT. RUNWAY - DAY                                               204 We're on the runway of an airport in Northern Italy. CAPTION: "THREE MONTHS LATER" A stretch limousine pulls up on the tarmac. A still-drunk JAMES HUNT and several good-looking WOMEN, rowdy FRIENDS (and hangers-on) spill out of the limo... They cross the tarmac towards their waiting private jet, passing other jets, when JAMES stops. He's seen something that has caught his eye. JAMES sends his FRIENDS on ahead to their waiting jet, and walks over to a small private jet, (a Learjet 35)...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I heard you were spending more and more time in one of these... A hunched PILOT doing final checks. The figure turns. It's NIKI. His wounds have healed a little, but it's still a painful sight...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you fly?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should try it. If something goes wrong up there, you're on the edge, but have to stay within the rules. Stick to regulations. Suppress the ego. It's good discipline for the racing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And there I was thinking you were about to wax lyrical about the romance of flight. I should have known better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What brings you here? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :                                                    204 JAMES indicates his rowdy, cool-looking friends..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A friend's wedding. At least I think it was a wedding. Might have been a birthday. All a bit of a blur. How about you? Been at Fiorano?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pre-season testing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Already? In February? You're relentless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure I meant it as a compliment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it is one. Relentlessness is good. Means you're a fighter. That you never give up. Behind my back I know some of you guys call me `The Rat.' Because I look like one. It's meant as an insult. But I don't mind it. Rats are ugly, sure. And no one likes them. But they're intelligent. With a strong survival instinct. JAMES can't help smiling. That's NIKI.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So when do you start testing? Next week?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you mad? I didn't just win the biggest thing of my life so I could get right back to work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? You need to. To prove to all the people who will always say you only won it because...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because what...? Because of your accident? Is that other people, Niki? Or you? I won. On the all important day when it came down to it, we raced on equal terms in equally good cars. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bottled and I had the guts to see it through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's true. You won that race. And believe me if I had to lose that title to anyone, I'm happy it was you. But that doesn't change the fact you have to win again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because that's what it means to be a winner, no? It's a permanent condition. Never stops or goes away. It stays with you always.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's winning? Sounds like losing to me. Some of life needs to be for pleasure, Niki. What's the use of having a million cups and medals if you never have any fun? How is that winning? The plane load of JAMES's friends call out..."C'mon, James!"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right. I could learn from you. In hospital the toughest part of my treatment was the vacuum. Pumping the shit out of my lungs. It was agony. While doing it, I was watching television...you winning all those races...and I was cursing you.. "That bastard, Hunt", I would shout, "I hate that guy." one day the doctor said, "Mr. Lauda, may I offer one piece of advice? Stop thinking of it as a curse to have been given an enemy in life. It can be a blessing, too." I said, "Who are you, Confucius?" He said, "A wise man gets more from his enemies than a fool from his friends." And you know, he's right. Look at us. We were a pair of kids when we first met. Hotheaded jerks in Formula 3. Headed nowhere. Now we're both Champions of the world. Not bad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, not bad. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So don't let me down now. I need you busting my balls. Get back to work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will, Niki. But I intend to enjoy myself first. And so should you. You think you can? NIKI stares. A blank look..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you on race day, Champ.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will. Champ. JAMES goes. NIKI watches him, pulled into his plane by his laughing, cool FRIENDS. An unmistakable flicker of envy in his eyes. Then NIKI turns, alone, and resumes his safety checks. 205 EXT. RUNWAY - AIRFIELD - DAY                                  205 JAMES's plane roars down the runway and takes off into the azure blue sky...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: HARALD ERTL, BRETT LUNGER, ARTURO MERZARIO, GUY EDWARDS
NIKI'S HOSPITAL ROOM/TELEVISION COVERAGE FULL FRAME -DAY 160

dialogue.raw_text: continues his rehab in the hospital, now out of bed... ON TV: the starter's flag drops. Another Grand Prix starts. This time at Zandvoort, in the Netherlands.. NIKI watches the race on television as DOCTORS put a vacuuum pump into his lungs. It's AGONY. JAMES leads, driving the perfect race...
dialogue.name: dialogue
